tool_description: Calculates optimal queue position and assignment based on call priority, agent availability, and current queue status.

call_priority.description: Priority level of the call (low, medium, high, critical)

agent_queue_lengths.description: Current queue length for each available agent

call_category.description: Category of call for queue balancing

error_messages: Invalid priority level: Priority must be one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Array length mismatch: Available agents and queue lengths arrays must have same length.
No available queues: All agent queues are at maximum capacity.
Invalid customer tier: Customer tier must be one of [standard, premium, vip].
usage: Provide call_priority, available_agents, and agent_queue_lengths, with optional customer_tier and call_category to calculate optimal queue assignment.

assigned_agent.description: Agent ID assigned for this call

queue_position.description: Position in the assigned agent's queue

assignment_reason.description: Explanation for the queue assignment decision

alternative_agents.description: Alternative agent options if primary becomes unavailable
